data.title: Gombe State Enrolment Centres
data.meta_description: The National Identity Management Commission (NIMC) operates and regulates matters of national identity in Nigeria with services covering National Identification Number (NIN) enrolment and issuance, National e-ID card issuance, identity verification as well as data harmonization and authentication.
data.text:
Special Centres may be set up for enrolment in some areas to operate for relatively shorter periods of time before being decommissioned.

State Office Opposite CBN, Buba Shongo, Gombe Akko LGA Akko LG Secretariat, Kan Hawa Kumo Amada Community Centre Lawanti Community Development Office, Amada Balanga LGA Balanga LG Secretariat, Talasse Billiri LGA LG Secretariat, Billiri Dukku LGA MDG Building, near Access Bank, along Darazo Road Funakaye LGA Funakaye LG Secretariat, Bajoga Gombe North LGA Behind Gombe LG Secretariat, Gombe Kaltungo Opposite, Lea Primary School, Kaltungo Kwadon Community Centre Emirs Palace, Kwadon Kwami LGA Kwami LG Secretariat, Malam Sidi Nafada LGA Nafada LG Secretariat, Nafada Pantami Community Centre NITDA Office, Pantami Shomgom LGA Shomgom LGA Secretariat, Boh Yalmatu-Deba LGA Fage near Area Court, Deba
